name: Saviours: Project GA.IA
description:
On a planet, really really far away, a settlement of humans is on the brink of extinction, at the mercy of a very unreliable, destructive AI! You alone, or with a friend are tasked to maintain the AI computer's integrity to keep the human's life support systems functional, all while satisfying and entertaining the AI to get more points than your friends!

Can you survive for 3 minutes with this broken AI computer? Or will your actions lead to the death of hundreds of humans?

Grab a friend and let's be saviours!
